Sql.query: insert into cpa_sddp ( cpsddpcodi, cparcodi, cpsddpcorrelativo, cpsddpnomarchivo, cpsddpsemanaini, cpsddpanioini, cpsddpnroseries, cpsddpdiainicio, cpsddpusucreacion, cpsddpfeccreacion ) values ( :cpsddpcodi, :cparcodi, :cpsddpcorrelativo, :cpsddpnomarchivo, :cpsddpsemanaini, :cpsddpanioini, :cpsddpnroseries, :cpsddpdiainicio, :cpsddpusucreacion, :cpsddpfeccreacion )

update cpa_sddp set cpsddpcodi = :cpsddpcodi, cparcodi = :cparcodi, cpsddpcorrelativo = :cpsddpcorrelativo, cpsddpnomarchivo = :cpsddpnomarchivo, cpsddpsemanaini = :cpsddpsemanaini, cpsddpanioini = :cpsddpanioini, cpsddpnroseries = :cpsddpnroseries, cpsddpdiainicio = :cpsddpdiainicio, cpsddpusucreacion = :cpsddpusucreacion, cpsddpfeccreacion = :cpsddpfeccreacion where cpsddpcodi = :cpsddpcodi

select cpsddpcodi, cparcodi, cpsddpcorrelativo, cpsddpnomarchivo, cpsddpsemanaini, cpsddpanioini, cpsddpnroseries, cpsddpdiainicio, cpsddpusucreacion, cpsddpfeccreacion from cpa_sddp order by cpsddpcodi asc
select * from cpa_sddp where cparcodi = :cparcodi order by cpsddpcorrelativo desc

select cpsddpcodi, cparcodi, cpsddpcorrelativo, cpsddpnomarchivo, cpsddpsemanaini, cpsddpanioini, cpsddpnroseries, cpsddpdiainicio, cpsddpusucreacion, cpsddpfeccreacion from cpa_sddp where (-1 = {0} or cpsddpcodi = {0})
select nvl(max(cpsddpcorrelativo), 0) + 1 from cpa_sddp where cparcodi = :cparcodi
